-- | Initialises the SQLite DB and creates table Games and Teams if not exists
initialiseDB :: IO Connection
initialiseDB :: IO Connection
initialiseDB = do
        Connection
conn <- String -> IO Connection
open String
"NBA.sqlite"
        Connection -> Query -> IO ()
execute_ Connection
conn Query
"CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS teams (\
            \id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,\
            \abbreviation VARCHAR(20),\
            \city VARCHAR(50),\
            \conference VARCHAR(50),\
            \division VARCHAR(50),\
            \full_name VARCHAR(50),\
            \name VARCHAR(50)\
            \)"
        Connection -> Query -> IO ()
execute_ Connection
conn Query
"CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS games (\
            \id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,\
            \date VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, \
            \home_team_score INTEGER,\
            \visitor_team_score INTEGER,\
            \period INTEGER,\
            \season INTEGER,\
            \status VARCHAR(50),\
            \home_team_fk INT,\
            \visitor_team_fk INT,\
            \UNIQUE(home_team_fk,visitor_team_fk,date)\
            \)"
        forall (m :: * -> *) a. Monad m => a -> m a
return Connection
conn

-- | Fetches fullname and name for teams whose matches id of home teams in games
querySelectedGames :: Connection -> String -> IO [SpecificGame]
querySelectedGames :: Connection -> String -> IO [SpecificGame]
querySelectedGames Connection
conn String
team_num = do
    forall q r.
(ToRow q, FromRow r) =>
Connection -> Query -> q -> IO [r]
query Connection
conn Query
"SELECT full_name, name from teams inner join games on teams.team_id_ == games.home_team_fk where home_team_fk = ?" (forall a. a -> Only a
Only (String
team_num :: String))
